 2009-12262009-07-30CRA,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectGagné-Lessard Sports Inc. Remission Order
PrecisRemission Order remits $49,238.32 to Gagné-Lesard Sports Inc., plus related penalties and interest, representing tax payable in respect of the sale of tires and new and used recreational vehicles to non-residents during the period beginning on October 1, 2000 and ending on June 30, 2002.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2009-0071 Publication Date: 2009-08-19
AttachmentsAttachment
